body_text:
Description
Automatically create a visually unique SHIELD/emblem for recipes.
Goal

Provide identifier that is easily rememberable and communicable between end users.

Level of Effort
Medium. @mythmon has already done a bulk of the work with regards to creating the prototype shields, which is awesome. The remaining work is implementing them into the site; the shields introduce a new aesthetic element in several places, which would require minor design QA/reworking.
